| Notes                   = In the [[Punisher: Red X-Mas Vol 1 1|Punisher: Red X-Mas]] stand-alone issue it states the Camorra family heads from Naples, which would mean they are talking about the Neapolitan Camorra. It's one of the top 3 criminal societies of Italy, rivals of the Sicilian Mafia and the Calabrian N'drangheta (the latter is now the dominant one in Italy). Yet, in issue #11 of the more recent [[Official Handbook of the Marvel Universe A to Z Vol 1 11|Official Handbook of the Marvel Universe A-Z]], it states its the "Sicilian Camorra clan", which would make mean the Sicilian Mafia (Cosa Nostra).
